input.sentences: this area is notorious for their scenery and beautiful leisure spots .
there is biking along the coast that you can participate in .

output.sentences: In our town there are spots notorious for their scenery.
One such place is on the coast where people go biking.
People come here for vacation and spend a lot of time.
During the summer, people have filled the beaches.
